readable.title: 3467843559_a457ce37b6
readable.content: A group of boys sits near the sidewalk and two are smiling while one makes a face . Three boys are posing for a picture , one of them making a silly face . Three boys pose on sidewalk , one boy holding a camera . Three young boys one is holding a camera and another is holding a green toy all are wearing tee shirts and smiling . Three young boys playing outside and posing for a picture
